lines: Humility isn't denying your strengths; it's being honest about your weaknesses.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc4123f8>

lines: True humility is being able to accept criticisms as graciously as we accept compliments.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc42b650>

lines: I claim to be a simple individual liable to err like any other fellow mortal. I own, however, that I have humility enough to confess my errors and to retrace my steps.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc43f2b8>

lines: Humility is the ability to give up your pride and still retain your dignity.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc463f50>

lines: Pride is concerned with who is right. Humility is concerned with what is right.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc4717b8>

lines: There is a loftier ambition than merely to stand high in the world. It is to stoop down and lift mankind a little higher.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc486b18>

lines: Your ambition should be to get as much life out of living as you possibly can, as much enjoyment, as much interest, as much experience, as much understanding. Not simply be what is generally called a ‘success.’
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc497378>

lines: Ambition is enthusiasm with a purpose.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc4a1b98>

lines: Ambition, fueled by compassion, wisdom and integrity, is a powerful force for good that will turn the wheels of industry and open the doors of opportunity for you and countless others.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc4ac430>

lines: When your ambition is greater than your fear, your life will get bigger than your dream.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc4be798>

lines: The strongest trust is built by the smallest actions, the keeping of the little promises.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc4c8f40>

lines: You don’t earn loyalty in a day. You earn loyalty day-by-day.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc4d9cc8>

lines: Loyalty is the pledge of truth to oneself and others.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc4e4218>

lines: No more important duty can be urged upon those who are entering the great theater of life than simple loyalty to their best convictions.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc4468d8>

lines: You cannot buy loyalty; you cannot buy the devotion of hearts, minds, and souls. You have to earn these things.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc514a08>

lines: Grit is that ‘extra something’ that separates the most successful people from the rest. It’s the passion, perseverance, and stamina that we must channel in order to stick with our dreams until they become a reality.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc525b28>

lines: Grit is the grain of character.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc537990>

lines: We like to think of our champions and idols as superheroes who were born different from us. We don’t like to think of them as relatively ordinary people who made themselves extraordinary.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc542048>

lines: The same boiling water that softens the potato hardens the egg. It's about what you're made of, not the circumstances.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc54c8e0>

lines: What we accomplish in the marathon of life depends tremendously on our grit—our passion and perseverance for long-term goals.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc55ebd0>

lines: I don’t like to gamble, but if there’s one thing I’m willing to bet on, it’s myself.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc5680e0>

lines: Put all excuses aside and remember this: You are capable.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc578f30>

lines: Magic is believing in yourself, if you can do that, you can make anything happen.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc591f08>

lines: Talk to yourself like you would to someone you love.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc5acb00>

lines: Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc5da320>

lines: A single act of kindness throws out roots in all directions, and the roots spring up and make new trees.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc5f8398>

lines: The ideals which have lighted my way, and time after time have given me new courage to face life cheerfully, have been kindness, beauty and truth.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc626220>

lines: Sometimes miracles are just good people with kind hearts.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc6fc4d8>

lines: No act of kindness is too small. The gift of kindness may start as a small ripple that over time can turn into a tidal wave affecting the lives of many.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc72fa90>

lines: Ah, kindness. What a simple way to tell another struggling soul that there is love to be found in the world.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc74b830>

lines: Education is for improving the lives of others and for leaving your community and world better than you found it.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc771b70>

lines: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
author: <Author:0x00007f7ddc7afc90>
